articles.author: Kathryn Ingate
articles.title: Carol Vorderman: Countdown legend in busty display as she suffers on-air webcam blunder - Express
articles.description: CAROL VORDERMAN - who is best known for hosting Countdown - accidentally put on a busty display while presenting her BBC Radio Wales show this morning when the webcam in the studio awkwardly lowered to show her chest rather than her face.
